tp:docstring.p: This object represents an endpoint for a stream. In a one-to-one call, there will be one (bidirectional) stream per content and one endpoint per stream (as there is only one remote contact). In a multi-user call there is a stream for each remote contact and each stream has one endpoint as it refers to the one physical machine on the other end of the stream.

The multiple endpoint use case appears when SIP call forking is used. Unlike jingle call forking (which is just making multiple jingle calls to different resources appear as one call), SIP call forking is actually done at the server so you have one stream to the remote contact and then and endpoint for each SIP client to be called.

property.name: RemoteCredentials
property.tp:docstring: The ICE credentials used for all candidates. If each candidate has different credentials, then this property SHOULD be ("", ""). Per-candidate credentials are set in the Candidate's Candidate_Info a{sv}.

signal.name: RemoteCredentialsSet
signal.tp:docstring: Emitted when the remote ICE credentials for the endpoint are set. If each candidate has different credentials, then this signal will never be fired.

property.name: RemoteCandidates
property.tp:docstring: A list of candidates for this endpoint.

signal.name: RemoteCandidatesAdded
signal.tp:docstring: Emitted when remote candidates are added to the RemoteCandidates property.

signal.name: CandidateSelected
signal.tp:docstring: Emitted when a candidate is selected for use in the stream.

arg.name: Candidate
arg.tp:docstring: The candidate that has been selected.

property.name: SelectedCandidate
property.tp:docstring: The candidate that has been selected for use to stream packets to the remote contact. Change notification is given via the the CandidateSelected signal.

arg.name: Candidate
arg.tp:docstring: The candidate that has been selected.

property.name: StreamState
property.tp:docstring: The stream state of the endpoint.

signal.name: StreamStateChanged
signal.tp:docstring: Emitted when the StreamState property changes.

method.name: SetStreamState
method.tp:docstring: Change the StreamState of the endpoint.

property.name: Transport
property.tp:docstring: The transport type for the stream endpoint.
